title: E92 Twin Theybies and a Phone Call to the Mayor
description:
Merry Christmas and a Happy Halloween! Spooky season continues with Halloween 2.0 featuring Em as Marty McFly and Christine as... still in her cat onesie! This week Em takes on the origins of the wailing woman, La Llorona and Christine continues Em's theme from last week by bringing us her mom Renate's paranormal and true crime stories! And find our what Patreon level gets you a live stream of Em sleeping... and that's why we drink!
Please consider supporting the companies that support us! 
Get 2 months of unlimited access to Skillshare for only $.99
Get 40% off all Lola subscriptions when you go to mylola.com/drink40
Get $10 off your first FabFitFun box when you go to fabfitfun.com and use our promo code DRINK
Stream the brand new second season of Gimlet's highly acclaimed podcast, Crimetown, free on Spotify!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
